description: All for One is the founder of the League of Villains. Once Japan`s most powerful villain and http://anidb.net/ch78199 [All Might]`s arch-nemesis, his true motives are unclear and his true identity unknown. His current goal is to raise http://anidb.net/ch87108 [Shigaraki Tomura] to become his eventual successor.
name: All for One
